servinfo.title: Electric Load Current Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection (J20A)

servinfosub.title: Using SUZUKI Scan Tool

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check “Battery Current” displayed on scan tool at following condition.

spec.title: Battery current
spec.ptxt: Run engine at 2000 rpm, headlight ON: 19.0 – 23.0 A
Run engine at 2000 rpm, headlight ON and blower motor switch is HI position: 37.0 – 42.0 A

servinfosub.ptxt: If check result is satisfactory, electric load current sensor is in good condition.
If check result is not satisfactory, check the following parts and circuit.

item.ptxt: Electric load current sensor circuit (power, ground and output)

servinfosub.ptxt: If electric load current sensor circuit and charging system is in good condition, electric load current sensor is faulty.

s1.ptxt: Measure sensor voltage between “C37-9” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground referring to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits:M16A and J20A .
If check result is satisfactory, electric load current sensor is in good condition.
If check result is not satisfactory, check the following parts and circuit.

item.ptxt: Electric load current sensor circuit (power, ground and output)

s1.ptxt: If electric load current sensor circuit and charging system is in good condition, electric load current sensor is faulty.
